about_the_game:
About the demo: This is a demo of a full-fledged game in which you have to find out why the apartment turned out to be so cheap. The full version will reveal even more secrets, but now you can immerse yourself in a frightening atmosphere and encounter mysterious events.


The plot: Andrey moved to Moscow for work and rented an apartment in a panel house, which suited his budget. Soon, while living in the apartment, he began to notice strange things that happen every night. Sometimes someone knocks on the door or just opens by itself, then strange sounds and voices wake up in the middle of the night. During the day, everything seemed to be returning to normal.



The landlady forgot to warn that Andrey would have neighbors living in the same apartment with him. She warned me only after I moved in, leaving a note telling me to be quiet, not to make any noise, and not to go where I shouldn't.



In the center of the plot is the apartment where the main action of the game takes place. Here Andrey meets strange neighbors who lived in this apartment before him. When he wakes up in the middle of the night, he watches his neighbors, explores locked rooms, and examines their notes. That's how it happened that he was stuck in this apartment, which used to seem like cheap housing in an old Soviet house.



Game Features:

- A demo of a full-fledged game, allowing you to look into its gloomy world.

- is a typical plot in the current everyday realities.

- A game in the genre of "walking simulator".

- Passing no more than an hour.

- Uncover the frightening secrets of the mysterious neighbors.

- Face the consequences of revealed secrets.

- The Soviet atmosphere of an apartment in our time.

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9400 / Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia geforce rtx 3060 / Radeon RX 6600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
